original_title: Cincinnati beatdown suspects released on bond as police hunt eighth person | Fox News
article_summary: Cincinnati mayor announces increased police presence as search continues for an eighth suspect in a viral downtown brawl that left several injured. Two suspects, DeKyra Vernon and Aisha Devaughn, have been released on bond, while charges of felonious assault, assault, and aggravated rioting have been filed against them. The police are seeking public assistance in locating the remaining suspect.</s>
